# GenAIScript Documentation

> GenAIScript provides powerful AI-driven automation for scripting and managing documentation workflows.

## Getting Started

- [Tutorial](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/getting-started/tutorial.md)
- [Running Scripts](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/getting-started/running-scripts.md)
- [Best Practices](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/getting-started/best-practices.md)

## Guides

- [Prompt as Code](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/guides/prompt-as-code.md)
- [Detection of Outdated Descriptions](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/guides/detection-outdated-descriptions.md)
- [Containerized Tools](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/guides/containerized-tools.md)

## Reference

- [Settings](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/reference/vscode/settings.md)
- [Run Command](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/reference/cli/run.md)
- [Commands](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/reference/cli/commands.md)
- [Scripts - YAML](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/reference/scripts/yaml.md)

- [Support for Agentic Tools](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/blog/support-for-agentic-tools.md)

- [Creating Release Notes with GenAI](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/blog/creating-release-notes-with-genai.md)
- [Automatic Web Page Content Analysis with GenAIScript](https://microsoft.github.io/genaiscript/blog/automatic-web-page-content-analysis-with-genaiscript.md)
